committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Zuni-Cibola National Historical Park Establishment Act of 1988 to enlarge the time in which the Secretary of the Interior may accept a leasehold interest for inclusion in the park.

summary.text: Amends the Zuni-Cibola National Historical Park Establishment Act of 1988 to extend the deadline for the establishment of the Zuni-Cibola National Historical Park.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Zuni-Cibola National Historical Park Establishment Act of 1988 to enlarge the time in which the Secretary of the Interior may accept a leasehold interest for inclusion in the park.
